ANU.name: Christine Regan
ANU.colleges: College of Arts and Social Sciences
expertise: Aboriginal And Torres Strait Islander Literature
interest: Literary studies; historical contextualizaton of British, Irish, and Indigenous  Australian literature
project: Christine is currently developing a new monograph and a collection of essays. She regularly reviews manuscripts for scholarly journals and publishes essays in her field of scholarship.

publication.title: The Rimbaud of Leeds: The Political Character of Tony Harrison

Andrew Palmer (2018): The Rimbaud of Leeds: The Political Character of Tony Harrison's Poetry, English Studies, DOI: 10.1080/0013838X.2018.1497823
